description: System utility to view and modify network-related settings. More information: https://learn.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2012-r2-and-2012/gg651155(v=ws.11).

useCases.description: Start or stop a Windows service synchronously:
Make sure an SMB share is available in the current console:
Show the folders currently shared over SMB:
Show who is using your SMB shares (run in elevated console):
Show users in a local security group:
Add a user to the local security group (run in elevated console):
